section.title: Project Format
section.para: A project format is all the files and directories that make up the representation of a Project on disk.
The native project format consists of a project file and all the data referenced by that file in one of several project directories.

section.title: The Project File
section.para: The project the file contains data aswell as references to the audio data on disk.

listitem.para: A project file should be human readable. why?
The project file must be able to be moved and the project should still open successfully. Which indicates a path to the root directory of project should be stored in project file.
